pkgmetadata.longdescription: Templated Word and PowerPoint Reporting of 'nlmixr2' Fitting Results // This allows you to generate reporting workflows around 'nlmixr2' analyses with outputs in Word and PowerPoint. You can specify figures, tables and report structure in a user- definable 'YAML' file. Also you can use the internal functions to access the figures and tables to allow their including in other outputs (e.g. R Markdown).
